text: is a Japanese yonkoma sh≈çnen manga series by Chama. It was first published on Niconico Seiga and later in Kadokawa Shoten's 4-Koma Nano Ace magazine. The manga ran between March 2011 and April 2014. An anime television series adaptation aired between April and June 2013. ==Other websites== * Official anime website * Aiura on Niconico Seiga * Category:Anime series based on manga Category:Comedy television series
